title: The economics of beauty: What do we know? What should we do? — Institute of Economic Affairs
description: The media have been excited by two American management academics, Leah Sheppard and Stefanie Johnson, who claim to find that highly attractive women are not rated as trustworthy as less attractive women and men. The implication of much of the discussion seems to be that attractive women are discriminated against. I have doubts about this study, … Continue reading "The economics of beauty: What do we know? What should we do?"
